content.body: Michael Ficarra: FYI: the biggest thing the V8 implementation got wrong was not tracking if an iterator helper was completed. since that's one of the things implicitly done by generators, and we implemented them as direct iterators
content.formatted_body: Michael Ficarra: FYI: the biggest thing the V8 implementation got wrong was not tracking if an iterator helper was completed. since that's one of the things implicitly done by generators, and we implemented them as direct iterators
